name: Yuanqing
personal background:
H4: Yuanqing Zheng (郑元庆)
H3: Biography
Yuanqing Zheng is an associate professor in the Department of Computing, the Hong Kong Polytechnic University. Previously, he was an assistant professor in the same department during 2014-2020. He received the Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. He received the B.S. degree in Electrical Engineering and the M.E. degree in Communication and Information System both from Beijing Normal University, Beijing, China.
H3: Research Interests
Wireless Networking and Mobile Computing, Acoustic and RF Sensing, Internet of Things (IoT) < researcher background not found > <Han is not mentioned as a researcher's background or affiliation. However, the researchers are Fu Xiao, Kui Ren, and Han does not have any information provided about them as they do not appear to be part of this publication or research group.>
